EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t Let Unexpected Downtime Keep You on the Ground
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
While it is true that today's equipment is more reliable than ever, it is also more complex. When things go wrong, repair costs and downtime can have a more significant impact on your bottom line than ever before.
Mid Canada Mod Center is pleased to offer customers the unparalleled protection afforded by Honeywell's Maintenance Service Plan. Our Maintenance Service Plan coverage options are flexible so you can select the coverage options that best meet your needs, and rest easy knowing you're benefitting from over 40 years of expertise.
Protect your investment and control your costs - as the unexpected can happen! For more information on this outstanding program or to request a quote, contact Mid Canada Mod Center today!
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/hmsp-mid-canada?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_mcmc_msp]]>
